short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents automatic PDF downloads and opens them in another tab instead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes navigating on the web easier and more efficient by avoiding that PDFs link download anything automatically, your PDFs will open in a new tab instead.

If you find any bug or you want to suggest some new functionality, contact me.
